test-group.name: [1] {staffUsername=27000002, staffPassword=123456, lang=en, registerMenuText=Register, notificationSettingMenuText=Notification Setting, dailyReportMenuText=Daily Report, managerUsername=9999999, managerPassword=triarrow, viewNotificationsMenuText=View Notifications, notificationMenuText=Notification, notificationSettingText=Notification Setting, addBtn=Add, successSave=Save successfully, deleteSuccess=Delete successfully, viewNotification=View Notifications}

test-step.description: When I open submenu Notification Setting of menu Notification
And In Notification Setting screen, i select more dropdown with value below | valueBranch | valuePosition | valueEmpName | | | | All employee |
And In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add
And In Notification Setting screen, I click in View Notifications
When I logout from system
When I open Login page
And I input my credentials username 27000002 and password 123456

test-group.name: And I change language to en

test-step.description: Change locale: en

test-step.description: And I open submenu Register of menu Daily Report
And I add new Daily report with data below | companyName | content | | CIJ | content |
Then The system should show message save daily report successfully
When I logout from system
And I input my credentials username 9999999 and password triarrow
And I change language to en
And I open submenu View Notifications of menu Notification
Then The system should show initialization screen of View Notifications page when have data
When In View notification screen, I click button 'Notification Setting'
And In Notification Setting screen, I delete all in table notification, show message Delete successfully
And In Notification Setting screen, i select more dropdown with value below | valueBranch | valuePosition | valueEmpName | | 大阪府 | All position | 岡本力 |
And In Notification Setting screen, I click in Add
Then In Notification Setting screen, System show message Save successfully
When In Notification Setting screen, I click in View Notifications
Then The system should show initialization screen of View Notifications page
